channel.title: Walking?
channel.description: I've tried hard to figure it out but cant...how do I do a simple procedure to make me walk from the bank to uh say...the air altar? Racked my brains and can't figure out quite how to do it! Do I click a certain x and y on minimap or wat? And whats an ent?

item.title: Walking?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

bullzeye95:

First, it’s very hard to make it walk all the way there. And I mean VERY. And an ent is a tree that breaks your axe. You know the trees that come alive and start wobbling back and forth?

It’s not that hard.

Just using the walking procedures in SRL. Then detecting your whereabouts with colors/dtms and continue on from there.

Read full topic

item.title: Walking?
item.dc:creator: @Boreas Boreas
item.description:
@Boreas wrote:

There used to be scripts that went from the air altar or the rimmington mine to the bank by clicking on the northern most point that it found the color of the road, until it saw the bank. This worked ok-ish until the road color in falador was made different to road color outside. What makes them unreliable, is that they don’t check where they are by using landmarks. Whichever method you use, make sure you use checks. Having a way to fix getting lost is better than trying to never get lost, if you know what I mean.

Read full topic

item.title: Walking?
item.dc:creator: @bobert5696 bobert5696
item.description:
@bobert5696 wrote:

there are 2 ways, ill go over them simply, most walkers use them in conjuction (this is at least how i do it :)) first, you can use coords, and you clickmouse to click on the minimap to go where you want, this can be VERY unreliable for many obvious reasons, seconds, must more reliable is you symbols (rare tree, water, etc) on the minimap, and either use bitmaps, or just colors to have the script find it on the bitmap, and and click it (god i loved aryan, so easy to walk, it had coords you just typed in :P)

Read full topic
